faqs.question: What is the leave policy?
faqs.answer: The company offers X days of annual leave, Y sick leaves, and Z casual leaves. You can check your balance in the HR portal.

faqs.question: How do I apply for leave?
faqs.answer: You can apply for leave via the HRMS portal or send an email to your manager for approval.

faqs.question: How many leaves do I have left?
faqs.answer: You can check your leave balance on the HRMS portal or contact HR for assistance.

faqs.question: Can I carry forward my unused leaves?
faqs.answer: Yes, up to a certain limit as per company policy. Check with HR for details.

faqs.question: How do I check my salary slip?
faqs.answer: You can download your salary slip from the HRMS portal under the payroll section.

faqs.question: When will I get my salary?
faqs.answer: Salaries are processed on the last working day of each month.

faqs.question: How do I update my bank account details for salary credit?
faqs.answer: Submit a request via HRMS along with your updated bank details.

faqs.question: What is the work-from-home policy?
faqs.answer: Employees can request work-from-home based on their department's policy. Approval from the manager is required.

faqs.question: Can I work remotely permanently?
faqs.answer: Permanent remote work is subject to company policy and manager approval.

faqs.question: What are the promotion criteria?
faqs.answer: Promotions are based on performance reviews, years of experience, and contributions to the company.

faqs.question: How do I enroll in company-sponsored training programs?
faqs.answer: Visit the HR portal and navigate to the Learning & Development section for available training programs.

faqs.question: What is the dress code policy?
faqs.answer: The company follows a business casual dress code, except on formal client meeting days.

faqs.question: How do I report workplace harassment?
faqs.answer: Employees can report workplace harassment confidentially through the HR grievance portal or speak with an HR representative directly.

faqs.question: How do I resign from the company?
faqs.answer: To resign, submit a formal resignation letter via email or HRMS, serve the required notice period, and complete exit formalities.
